trans-unit.source: Defines methods for reading the parts of a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Definisce i metodi per la lettura delle parti di un <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the color contexts on the page.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di tutti i contesti di colore nella pagina.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> that includes every <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref> that is on the page.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> che include ogni <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"> </xref> che si trova nella pagina.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the fonts that are used on the page.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di tutti i tipi di carattere utilizzati nella pagina.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> that includes every <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref> that is on the page.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> che include ogni <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"> </xref> che si trova nella pagina.

trans-unit.source: Gets the color context for the resource that has the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il contesto di colore per la risorsa che è stato specificato [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] della risorsa.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the font that has the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di carattere che è stato specificato [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the font.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del tipo di carattere.

trans-unit.source: The font that has the specified Uri.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di carattere con l'Uri specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the image that has the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'immagine che è stato specificato [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the image.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] dell'immagine.

trans-unit.source: The image that has the specified Uri.
trans-unit.target: L'immagine con l'Uri specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the resource that has the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la risorsa che è stato specificato [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you do not know the specific type of the resource with the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo quando non si conosce il tipo specifico di risorsa specificato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: When you do know the type, use one of the type-specific methods that is provided by this class.
trans-unit.target: Quando si conosce il tipo, utilizzare uno dei metodi specifici del tipo fornito da questa classe.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] della risorsa.

trans-unit.source: The resource that has the specified Uri.
trans-unit.target: La risorsa con l'Uri specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the resource dictionary that has the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il dizionario risorse che è stato specificato [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del dizionario risorse.

trans-unit.source: The resource dictionary that has the specified Uri.
trans-unit.target: Il dizionario risorse che è l'Uri specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the images on the page.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di tutte le immagini nella pagina.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> that includes every <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"></xref> that is on the page.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> che include ogni <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"> </xref> che si trova nella pagina.

trans-unit.source: Gets the page number.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di pagina.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> that represents the page number.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Int32>che rappresenta il numero di pagina.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>, if a ticket exists, that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>, se esiste un ticket, che è associato il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] page, see chapter 2 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>fa parte di un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] pagina, vedere il capitolo 2 nella [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specifica, in cui è possibile ottenere in [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that contains the default printing options for the page; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> exists for the page.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> che contiene le opzioni di stampa predefinite per la pagina; o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se nessun <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> esiste per la pagina.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the resource dictionaries for the page.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di tutti i dizionari delle risorse per la pagina.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments"></xref> part of the markup of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] package.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments"> </xref> fa parte del markup di un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments>elemento di un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] del pacchetto, vedere il capitolo 9 nella [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specifica, in cui è possibile ottenere in [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure"></xref> that represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments"></xref> element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] package.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure"> </xref> che rappresenta un <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments"> </xref> elemento in un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the thumbnail image, if a thumbnail exists, that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'immagine di anteprima, se esiste un'immagine di anteprima, che è associato il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"></xref> that represents the image.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"> </xref> che rappresenta l'immagine.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the page.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Uri>che rappresenta il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] per la pagina.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> for the page.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>per la pagina.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> for the page.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>per la pagina.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>
